publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-968 Mr Jim Wallace: The Draft Renewables Obligation (Scotland) Order 2004-That the Enterprise and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Renewables Obligation (Scotland) Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*
